name: Geishako 芸妓道
description:
[ This game is still under development]

Welcome to the Life OS 2.0, a city with no freedom. This is the story of Akiko, one of the freedom rider in this new and corrupted world. Artucia wants to manipulate the world, and you have to stop their plan...

Geishako is a third person rogue-like platformer. You have to destroy all the memory machine and fight your way out through many evil machines made by Artucia.

This game is still in a early development state, any game element may change over time. If you have any suggestion or bug report for this game please comment below.
